name: PassPractice
short_description:
A very simple application that stores a salted hash of any password you add and lets you practice by writing the password and checking if it was valid.

Useful for memorizing a password before actually using it. 

**** YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY SECURITY BREACH THAT MAY RESULT FROM USING THIS APPLICATION AND I GIVE NO GUARANTEE WHATSOEVER THAT THE APPLICATION IS SECURE ENOUGH. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ****
summary: An application to practice your passwords
